problems.title: Delete the Largest Element from Max Heap
problems.description:
Problem Statement

You are given N integers. Create a max heap by inserting all values.
Then delete the largest element from the heap.
Print the deleted value and the remaining heap.

Input Format
The first line contains integer N.
The second line contains N space-separated integers.

Output Format
First line: Print the deleted value.
Second line: Print the remaining heap as space-separated values, or "Heap is Empty" if heap becomes empty.

Example
Input:
5
30 20 40 10 25

Output:
40
30 25 20 10

Explanation:
After inserting all elements, max heap is [40, 25, 30, 10, 20]. Delete 40. Remaining heap is [30, 25, 20, 10].
problems.examples:
Sample Input 1
5
30 20 40 10 25

Sample Output 1
40
30 25 20 10

Sample Input 2
3
10 20 30

Sample Output 2
30
20 10

hintsList: To delete max: remove root, move last element to root, then heapify down.
Compare with children and swap with larger child if needed.
